TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed PartChromeState extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定控件及其周围的边框是处于正常状态还是最小化状态。

span.span: Specifies whether a control and the border surrounding it are in a normal or minimized state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 枚举表示 Web 部件控件及其周围边框可以处于的状态。The enumeration represents the possible visible states that a Web Parts control and its surrounding border can be in. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 使用 ASP.NET 网页中引用的自定义控件来声明枚举。The following code examples demonstrate the declarative use of the enumeration by using a custom control referenced in an ASP.NET Web page. 要使代码示例运行，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式编译该程序集，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以将源代码放在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中，它将在运行时动态编译。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 有关演示两种编译方法的演练，请参阅[演练：开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). 该示例的第一部分包含名为的自定义控件的代码 `TextDisplayWebPart` 。The first part of the example contains the code for the custom control, named `TextDisplayWebPart`. 由于控件派生自 ，因此它还继承类提供的公共属性 ，包括 属性，该属性使用 枚举作为其返回类型。Because the control derives from , it also inherits the common properties that the class provides, including the property, which uses the enumeration as its return type. [!code-csharp[WebParts_Part_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Part_Overview/CS/textdisplaywebpart.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_Part_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Part_Overview/VB/textdisplaywebpart.vb#2)] 请注意，在网页的声明性标记中，该控件的第二个实例 `TextDisplayWebPart` 将设置其 属性。Note that in the declarative markup for the Web page, the second instance of the `TextDisplayWebPart` control sets its property. 在浏览器中加载页面后，第二个控制实例会最小化显示。After you load the page in a browser, the second control instance appears minimized. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_Part_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Part_Overview/CS/partoverviewcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_Part_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Part_Overview/VB/partoverviewvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeState Minimized = int32(1)

summary.span: 处于折叠或最小化状态的控件和边框。

span.span: A control and border in a collapsed or minimized state.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeState Normal = int32(0)

summary.span: 处于正常状态的控件和边框。

span.span: A control and border in a normal state.
